mapper.select: select count(*) from `user` where userName = #{username} and password = #{password}
select userId, userName, name, password, avatarAddr, whatsup, color from `user` where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update `user` set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, whatsup = #{whatsup}, color=#{color} where userId = #{userid}
update questions set response = #{response}, visibility = #{visibility}, updtime = NOW() where questionId = #{questionId}
update questions set visiblity = #{visibility}, updtime = NOW() where questionId = #{questionId}
mapper.select: select userId from questions where questionId = #{questionId}
